    • Method Detail

      • uiReadyRICededReserve

        public static RICededReserveBuilder uiReadyRICededReserve(ValueGenerator<? extends Exposure> exposure,
                                                          CurrencyAmount amount)
        Returns a RICededReserveBuilder for creating a reserve with a single line item in SUBMITTED state, on an approved reserveset. It will have costtype and costcategory set but there is no guarantee what values these fields will have; it is recommended to explicitly specify values for both fields (using withCostType() and withCostCategory()). Note that the containing reserveset will contain only this reserve. If you want to commit a reserveset with multiple reserve transactions, you will have to create a separate RITransactionSetBuilder and link RICededReserveBuilders to it.
        Parameters:
        exposure - the claim the created reserve should be coded to
        amount - the amount of the (single) line item on the created reserve
        Returns:
        a UI-ready RICededReserveBuilder, with the specified properties and TransactionStatus of SUBMITTED

      • uiReadyRICededReserve

        public static RICededReserveBuilder uiReadyRICededReserve(Exposure exposure,
                                                          CurrencyAmount amount)
        Returns a RICededReserveBuilder for creating a reserve with a single line item in SUBMITTED state, on an approved reserveset. It will have costtype and costcategory set but there is no guarantee what values these fields will have; it is recommended to explicitly specify values for both fields (using withCostType() and withCostCategory()). Note that the containing reserveset will contain only this reserve. If you want to commit a reserveset with multiple reserve transactions, you will have to create a separate RITransactionSetBuilder and link RICededReserveBuilders to it.
        Parameters:
        exposure - the claim the created reserve should be coded to
        amount - the amount of the (single) line item on the created reserve
        Returns:
        a UI-ready RICededReserveBuilder, with the specified properties and TransactionStatus of SUBMITTED
